front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Routine Impulse Tests for Distribution Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: General test procedures for performing routine quality control tests that are suitable for high-volume, production line testing are included in this recommended practice. Transformer connections, test methods, circuit configurations, and failure detection methods are addressed. This recommended practice covers liquid-immersed, single- and three-phase distribution transformers.
